trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for all Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensators.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base para todos os Compensators do Gestor de recursos de compensação (CRM).

trans-unit.source: The user should extend from this object in order to write a custom transaction Compensator.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador deve expandir deste objeto, para escrever uma transação personalizada compensador.

trans-unit.source: A Compensator must always have a public constructor; otherwise, the recovery engine cannot create it.
trans-unit.target: Um compensador sempre tem de ter um construtor público; caso contrário, o motor de recuperação não é possível criá-la.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: criar um Gestor de recursos de compensação (CRM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator during the abort phase.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um registo para o compensador compensação Resource Manager (CRM) durante a fase de abortar.

trans-unit.source: The log record to be delivered.
trans-unit.target: O registo a ser entregue.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o registo fornecido deve ser esquecido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the abort phase of the transaction completion, and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o compensador compensação Resource Manager (CRM) da fase abortar da conclusão da transação e o fornecimento futura de registos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to begin abort phase; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para começar a fase abortar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the commit phase of the transaction completion and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o compensador compensação Resource Manager (CRM) da fase de confirmação da conclusão da transação e o fornecimento futura de registos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to begin commit phase; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para começar a fase de confirmação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator of the prepare phase of the transaction completion and the upcoming delivery of records.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o compensador compensação Resource Manager (CRM) da fase de preparação da conclusão da transação e o fornecimento futura de registos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o Gestor de recursos de compensação (CRM) <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record in forward order during the commit phase.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um registo na ordem de pesquisa direta durante a fase de confirmação.

trans-unit.source: The log record to forward.
trans-unit.target: O registo para reencaminhar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o registo fornecido deve ser esquecido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has received all the log records available during the abort phase.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o Gestor de recursos de compensação (CRM) compensador que recebeu a todos os registos de registo disponíveis durante a fase de abortar.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has delivered all the log records available during the commit phase.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o compensador compensação Resource Manager (CRM) que tem a entregar todos os registos de registo disponíveis durante a fase de confirmação.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator that it has had all the log records available during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o Gestor de recursos de compensação (CRM) compensador que apresentou a todos os registos de registo disponíveis durante a fase de preparação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Delivers a log record in forward order during the prepare phase.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um registo na ordem de pesquisa direta durante a fase de preparação.

trans-unit.source: The log record to forward.
trans-unit.target: O registo para reencaminhar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the delivered record should be forgotten; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o registo fornecido deve ser esquecido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
